Activity: Wake up and have a healthy breakfast.
Arrive at the office. Review emails and the previous day's summary report. Prepare for the day's meetings.
Meeting with @AUDIT-1 (External Auditor) to discuss the audit plan and timeline. Address any concerns and provide necessary documentation.
Review the fund's risk management framework with @CIO-1 and @QRES-2. Ensure adequate controls are in place to mitigate potential risks.
Discuss the fund's operational procedures with @PM-1. Ensure smooth and efficient execution of trades.
Lunch - Attend an industry luncheon on alternative investments to network with potential investors and learn about the latest trends.
Meeting with @ONBD-1 (Client Onboarding Specialist) to review the onboarding process for UHNWI clients. Ensure a smooth and efficient experience.
Review the marketing materials for the fund with @MKT-1. Provide feedback on the messaging and branding.

Hold a project update meeting with all team leads (@PM-1, @LARCH-1, @QRES-1, @LEGAL-1, @COMP-1, @FACC-1). Discuss progress, challenges, and upcoming milestones. Review resource allocation and adjust as needed. @PEOPLE: PM-1, LARCH-1, QRES-1, LEGAL-1, COMP-1, FACC-1, Subject: Comprehensive Project Update
Prepare a summary report of the day's activities and send it to @CIO-1. Highlight key decisions and action items.
Leave the office. Review personal finances and investments.
